subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Detroit Pistons were hanging out at the scorer’s table as if it were a preseason game, joking with their former teammate Flip Murray as he enjoyed a drink and nacho chips in the front row.
snippet: The Detroit Pistons were hanging out at the scorer’s table as if it were a preseason game, joking with their former teammate Flip Murray as he enjoyed a drink and nacho chips in the front row.
